multiple_pregnancy.read: select A.id, A.typeid, A.status, A.reliability, A.comments, A.patientid, A.device as deviceid, A.organization as organizationid, A.practitioner as practitionerid, A.quantity , A.appliesdatetime from mis.v_clinical_observation_multiple_pregnancy A where A.id=?
multiple_pregnancy.create: insert into mis.v_clinical_observation_multiple_pregnancy (status,reliability,comments,patientid,device,organization,practitioner,quantity,appliesdatetime,id) values (${PAGE.strRepeat("?",",",10)}) returning id as id
multiple_pregnancy.update: update mis.v_clinical_observation_multiple_pregnancy set status =?, reliability=?, comments=?, patientid=?, device=?, organization=?, practitioner=?, quantity=?, appliesdatetime=? where id=? returning id as id

duration_of_pregnancy.read: select A.id, A.status, A.reliability, A.comments, A.patientid, A.device as deviceid, A.organization as organizationid, A.practitioner as practitionerid, A.valuedate, A.code, A.appliesdatetime from mis.v_clinical_observation_duration_of_pregnancy A where A.id=?
duration_of_pregnancy.create: insert into mis.v_clinical_observation_duration_of_pregnancy (status,reliability,comments,patientid,device,organization,practitioner,valuedate,code,appliesdatetime,id) values (${PAGE.strRepeat("?",",",11)}) returning id as id

press_bld_and_heart_rate.create: insert into mis.v_clinical_observation_press_bld_and_heart_rate (status,reliability,comments,patientid,device,organization,practitioner,appliesdatetime,dia,sys,puls,entrymethod,id) values (${PAGE.strRepeat("?",",",13)}) returning id as id

health.read: select A.id, A.status, A.reliability, A.comments, A.patientid, A.device as deviceid, A.organization as organizationid, A.practitioner as practitionerid, A.code, A.appliesdatetime from mis.v_clinical_observation_HEALTH A where A.id=?
health.create: insert into mis.v_clinical_observation_HEALTH (status,reliability,comments,patientid,device,organization,practitioner,code,appliesdatetime) values (${PAGE.strRepeat("?",",",9)}) returning id as id
health.update: update mis.v_clinical_observation_HEALTH set status=?, reliability=?, comments=?, patientid=?, device=?, organization=?, practitioner=?, code=?, appliesdatetime=? from mis.v_clinical_observation_HEALTH where A.id=? returning id as id

mdc_len_body_actual.create: insert into mis.v_clinical_observation_MDC_LEN_BODY_ACTUAL (status,reliability,comments,patientid,device,organization,practitioner,appliesdatetime,quantity,id) values (${PAGE.strRepeat("?",",",10)}) returning id as id

note.create: insert into mis.v_clinical_observation_NOTE (status,reliability,comments,patientid,device,organization,practitioner,appliesdatetime,string,id) values (${PAGE.strRepeat("?",",",10)}) returning id as id
note.update: update mis.v_clinical_observation_NOTE set status=?, reliability=?, comments=?, patientid=?, device=?, organization=?, practitioner=?, string=?, appliesdatetime=? where id=? returning id as id

mdc_temperature.read: select A.id, A.typeid, A.status, A.reliability, A.comments, A.patientid, A.device as deviceid, A.organization as organizationid, A.practitioner as practitionerid, A.quantity, A.code, A.appliesdatetime from mis.v_clinical_observation_MDC_TEMPERATURE A where A.id=?
mdc_temperature.create: insert into mis.v_clinical_observation_MDC_TEMPERATURE (status,reliability,comments,patientid,device,organization,practitioner,appliesdatetime,quantity,code,id) values (${PAGE.strRepeat("?",",",11)}) returning id as id
mdc_temperature.update: update mis.v_clinical_observation_MDC_TEMPERATURE set status=?, reliability=?, comments=?, patientid=?, device=?, organization=?, practitioner=?, appliesdatetime=?, quantity=?, code=? where id=? returning id as id

measurement_of_water_balance.read: select A.id, A.status, A.reliability, A.comments, A.patientid, A.device as deviceid, A.organization as organizationid, A.practitioner as practitionerid, A.quantity, A.code, A.appliesdatetime from mis.v_clinical_observation_MEASUREMENT_OF_WATER_BALANCE A where A.id=?
measurement_of_water_balance.create: insert into mis.v_clinical_observation_MEASUREMENT_OF_WATER_BALANCE (status,reliability,comments,patientid,device,organization,practitioner,appliesdatetime,quantity,code,id) values (${PAGE.strRepeat("?",",",11)}) returning id as id
measurement_of_water_balance.update: update mis.v_clinical_observation_MEASUREMENT_OF_WATER_BALANCE set status=?, reliability=?, comments=?, patientid=?, device=?, organization=?, practitioner=?, appliesdatetime=?, quantity=?, code=? where id=? returning id as id

measurement_fruit.read: select A.id, A.status, A.reliability, A.comments, A.patientid, A.device as deviceid, A.organization as organizationid, A.practitioner as practitionerid, A.quantity, A.code, A.appliesdatetime from mis.v_clinical_observation_MEASUREMENT_FRUIT A where A.id=?
measurement_fruit.create: insert into mis.v_clinical_observation_MEASUREMENT_FRUIT (status,reliability,comments,patientid,device,organization,practitioner,appliesdatetime,quantity,code,id) values (${PAGE.strRepeat("?",",",11)}) returning id as id
measurement_fruit.update: update mis.v_clinical_observation_MEASUREMENT_FRUIT set status=?, reliability=?, comments=?, patientid=?, device=?, organization=?, practitioner=?, appliesdatetime=?, quantity=?, code=? where id=? returning id as id

concentration_glucose.read: select A.id, A.typeid, A.status, A.reliability, A.comments, A.patientid, A.device as deviceid, A.organization as organizationid, A.practitioner as practitionerid, A.quantity, A.code, A.bodysite, A.foodintake, A.entrymethod, A.appliesdatetime from mis.v_clinical_observation_concentration_glucose A where A.id=?
concentration_glucose.create: insert into mis.v_clinical_observation_concentration_glucose (status,reliability,comments,patientid,device,organization,practitioner,appliesdatetime,quantity,code,bodysite,foodintake,entrymethod,id) values (${PAGE.strRepeat("?",",",14)}) returning id as id
concentration_glucose.update: update mis.v_clinical_observation_concentration_glucose set status=?, reliability=?, comments=?, patientid=?, device=?, organization=?, practitioner=?, appliesdatetime=?, quantity=?, code=?, bodysite=?, foodintake=?, entrymethod=? where id=? returning id as id

attachment.read: SELECT A.id, A.status, A.reliability, A.comments, A.patientid, A.device as deviceid, A.organization as organizationid, A.practitioner as practitionerid, A.code, A.appliesdatetime, A.filename, A.contenttype, A.format, A.size FROM mis.v_clinical_observation_attachment A where A.id=?
attachment.create: insert into mis.v_clinical_observation_attachment (status,reliability,comments,patientid,device,organization,practitioner,appliesdatetime,code,filename,contenttype,format,size,content,id) values (${PAGE.strRepeat("?",",",15)}) returning id as id
attachment.update: update mis.v_clinical_observation_attachment set status=?, reliability=?, comments=?, patientid=?, device=?, organization=?, practitioner=?, appliesdatetime=? where id=? returning id as id
attachment.download: select A.filename,A.contenttype,A.format,A.content from mis.v_clinical_observation_attachment A where A.id=?

type_absorption_liquid.read: SELECT id, status, reliability, comments, patientid, device as deviceid, organization as organizationid, practitioner as practitionerid, string, appliesdatetime from mis.v_clinical_observation_type_absorption_liquid where id=?
type_absorption_liquid.create: insert into mis.v_clinical_observation_type_absorption_liquid (status,reliability,comments,patientid,device,organization,practitioner,string,appliesdatetime,id) values (${PAGE.strRepeat("?",",",10)}) returning id as id
type_absorption_liquid.update: update mis.v_clinical_observation_type_absorption_liquid set status=?, reliability=?, comments=?, patientid=?, device=?, organization=?, practitioner=?, string=?, appliesdatetime=? where id=? returning id as id

root.getauthuser: select patient as patient_id from mis.v_administrative_patient_identifier where value=?
root.device_search_serial_number: select d.id, d.manufacturer, d.model, d.version, d.udi, d.lotnumber, d.patientid from mis.v_administrative_device_identifier ident_d inner join mis.v_administrative_device d on ident_d.device=d.id where ident_d.value=?
root.device_concentration_glucose_search: select A.id, A.typeid, A.status, A.reliability, A.comments, A.patientid, A.device as deviceid, A.organization as organizationid, A.practitioner as practitionerid, A.quantity, A.code, B.name as codename, A.bodysite, (select name from mis.v_glossary_concentration_glucose_bodysite D where A.bodysite=D.code) as bodysitename, A.foodintake, (select name from mis.v_glossary_concentration_glucose_food_intake C where A.foodintake=C.code) as foodintakename, A.entrymethod, A.appliesdatetime from mis.v_clinical_observation_concentration_glucose A, mis.v_glossary_types_measurement_concentration_glucose B where A.code=B.code and A.code = ? and A.bodysite = ? and A.entrymethod = ? and A.patientid = ? and A.appliesdatetime = ? and A.device = ? and A.quantity = ?
